mapper.sql: teacher_id, teacher_number, teacher_name, teacher_password, teacher_sex, identity, is_valid, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select teacher_number,teacher_name from teacher where teacher_number = #{teacher_number} and teacher_password=#{teacher_password}
mapper.insert:
insert into teacher
teacher_id,
teacher_number,
teacher_name,
teacher_password,
teacher_sex,
identity,
is_valid,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update teacher
teacher_number = #{teacherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_name = #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_password = #{teacherPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_sex = #{teacherSex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
identity = #{identity,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update teacher set teacher_number = #{teacherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_name = #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_password = #{teacherPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_sex = #{teacherSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, identity = #{identity,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
